mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_PBI_LBI( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, NAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, MARRIAGE_STATUS, REGISTER_ADDRESS, CURRENT_ADDRESS, TEL, MOBILE, OCCUPATION_TYPE, POSITION_TYPE, TITLE_TYPE, EDUCATION, INFO_DATE, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{marriageStatus}, #{registerAddress}, #{currentAddress}, #{tel}, #{mobile}, #{occupationType}, #{positionType}, #{titleType}, #{education}, #{infoDate}, #{appId} )
